title: What has been the most significant human impact on our society? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say the creation and evolution of language. Language and communication created a way for thoughts and ideas to be passed on to other people and, eventually, down to different generations. Without language, it would be very difficult for the societies we know today to actually form. Language not only allows communication but it also allows for progress to be passed on. I hope this helped.
